text: A DataBlade is a module for the IBM Informix database server. Released in 1996,http://news.cnet.com/2100-1001-233201.html it allows creating complex, custom datatypes whilst providing the same level of integration as built-in datatypes.http://publib.boulder.ibm.com/infocenter/idshelp/v10/index.jsp?topic=/com.ibm.dbdk.doc/dbdk26.htm ==References== ==External links== *What are DataBlade modules? Category:Informix
title: DataBlade
